alert.note: Alert for Imperial (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 15 at 2:26PM PDT until October 15 at 5:15PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHWESTERN IMPERIAL COUNTY... At 226 PM PDT, local Fire Department in El Centro reported flooded parking lots at Hospital and flood waters entering building. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... El Centro, Calexico, Imperial, Plaster City, Holtville, Mt. Signal, El Centro Naval Airfield, Heber, Seeley, Bonds Corner and Dixieland. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
